exposed.height: The inner height of the browser window.
exposed.lg: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **lg**.
exposed.lgAndDown: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **lg** or lower.
exposed.lgAndUp: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **lg** or higher.
exposed.md: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **md**.
exposed.mdAndDown: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **md** or lower.
exposed.mdAndUp: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **md** or higher.
exposed.mobile: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is considered to be a mobile breakpoint.
exposed.mobileBreakpoint: Controls which named breakpoint (**lg**, **md**, etc) or browser width (in px) is considered to be mobile.
exposed.name: Name of the current breakpoint.
exposed.sm: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **sm**.
exposed.smAndDown: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **sm** or lower.
exposed.smAndUp: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **sm** or higher.
exposed.thresholds: An object describing the width values of each breakpoint.
exposed.update: Function that updates the current width and height values.
exposed.width: The inner width of the browser window.
exposed.xl: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **xl**.
exposed.xlAndDown: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **xl** or lower.
exposed.xlAndUp: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **xl** or higher.
exposed.xs: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **xs**.
exposed.xxl: Returns **true** if the current browser breakpoint is **xxl**.
exposed.ssr: Returns **true** if the current page was server rendered.
exposed.displayClasses: Returns an object containing the breakpoints and their corresponding classes.
